forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere is punctuated with bright patches of sunshine, a rarity that brings a welcomed warmth. Though the day is mild, with a peak temperature around 62, the persistent west-southwest winds whirl around at 14 mph, occasionally gusting to 21 mph, creating a playful dance of leaves and the subtle sound of rustling branches in the air. As the hours drift towards evening, clouds will begin to envelop the city, settling in with a gentle embrace, bringing the low down to about 56. 

With the marine layer hanging just above the coast, there may be hints of fog creeping along the edges, particularly veiling the Golden Gate Bridge, offering an iconic silhouette against a backdrop of soft gray. This weather calls for layers; a light jacket would serve you well as the breeze carries a chill. Consider wandering through one of the local parks, where you might find solace in the quiet murmur of the trees or perhaps enjoy a leisurely cup of coffee at a nearby café, a perfect complement to this serene yet dynamic San Francisco afternoon.
